# Copilot Instructions for geminivideo

## Repository Overview
This repository is for the geminivideo project.

## General Guidelines
- Follow best practices for code quality and maintainability
- Write clear, concise commit messages
- Ensure code is well-documented with appropriate comments
- Follow existing code style and conventions in the repository

## Code Style
- Use consistent indentation
- Follow language-specific best practices
- Keep functions and methods focused and single-purpose
- Use meaningful variable and function names

## Testing
- Write tests for new features and bug fixes
- Ensure all existing tests pass before submitting changes
- Aim for good test coverage

## Documentation
- Update README.md when adding new features
- Document public APIs and functions
- Include usage examples where appropriate

## Pull Requests
- Keep PRs focused on a single concern
- Write descriptive PR titles and descriptions
- Link related issues in PR descriptions
- Respond to review feedback promptly
